relation: CAB and Residence Life always have something going on and if not you could always just go to the gym, hit the library for a good read, or just enjoy the weather around the fire pit with some friends.
The food in the cafe is delicious! A little pricy but you get what you pay for.
The apartments right now are in need of updating I think but still a nice place to be.
The classes are challenging so don't come here thinking you'll smooth on by without a little bit of a challenge.
This college is small but it is what you make of it.
A place away from my hometown. A well kept campus with great community support. Where you could meet people from other places than your hometown.
pageTitle: Dalton State College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Campus Safety everywhere any one goes at dalton state college you will see a school police man or woman. of course, you can find an emergency phone in various locations if something goes wrong or if for some reason the elevator gets stuck. for the most part its a quiet school so no one would really expect much harm to happen at the college. Greek Life at my school since it is still barely progressing as a four year institution it doest not have and greek life. so i really would not know how that is but i am sure that the girls and guys are very competitive of his or her groups. sisterhood or brotherhood, i can imagine the responsibilities it comes with being faithful to the group and honesty. Clubs and Activities in our college my first year we had latin dance club organized by hispanics, which was quite interesting because it was nice seeing something then traditional at school. unfortunately, after its first year it did not become successful as it was expected to do and it no longer exists. i was never able to attend it because my classes and the hour meetings never worked out well together but my friends did tell me it was
